dcterms:creator: P. Sen
G. Namata
M. Bilgic
L. Getoor
B. Galligher
T. Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset where each node represents a document and an edge indicates a citation link. Each node's feature vector contains a bag-of-words representation of the document.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: P. Sen
G. Namata
M. Bilgic
L. Getoor
B. Galligher
T. Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset similar to Cora, where nodes represent documents and edges represent citation links, with feature vectors based on bag-of-words.
dcterms:title: Citeseer

dcterms:creator: P. Sen
G. Namata
M. Bilgic
L. Getoor
B. Galligher
T. Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset where nodes represent documents and edges represent citation links, featuring a bag-of-words representation for each document.
dcterms:title: Pubmed

dcterms:creator: O. Shchur
M. Mumme
A. Bojchevski
S. Günnemann
dcterms:description: A co-authorship graph dataset where nodes represent authors and edges represent co-authorship relationships. Features are based on the keywords of the authors' papers.
dcterms:title: Coauthor Physics

dcterms:creator: O. Shchur
M. Mumme
A. Bojchevski
S. Günnemann
dcterms:description: A segment of the Amazon co-purchase graph where nodes represent products and edges represent frequent co-purchases. Features are based on product reviews.
dcterms:title: Amazon Computer

dcterms:creator: O. Shchur
M. Mumme
A. Bojchevski
S. Günnemann
dcterms:description: A segment of the Amazon co-purchase graph where nodes represent products and edges represent frequent co-purchases. Features are based on product reviews.
dcterms:title: Amazon Photo
